title: submit_lead_saves_contact_and_project_info
description: Test /api/submit-lead to ensure lead data creates a new project session retrievable via /api/projects.

title: get_market_prices_returns_current_data
description: Verify that the market price fetching endpoint correctly retrieves up-to-date renovation material and service prices from Perplexity AI and returns them in the expected format.

title: generate_render_produces_photorealistic_images
description: Test the render generation endpoint to confirm it produces photorealistic interior design images based on user inputs using Gemini Image Gen and stores the results properly.

title: save_quote_stores_structured_renovation_draft
description: Validate that the quote saving endpoint stores renovation quote drafts in a structured format in Firestore and allows retrieval for editing or review.

title: analyze_room_outputs_structural_style_condition_insights
description: Ensure the room analysis endpoint processes uploaded images or videos and returns accurate structural, style, and condition insights consistent with the input media.

title: plan_renovation_generates_skeleton_skin_architectural_plan
description: Test the renovation planning endpoint to verify it generates coherent text-based architectural plans following the Skeleton & Skin methodology based on room analysis.

title: list_project_files_returns_complete_asset_listing
description: Verify that assets uploaded via /api/upload/image appear correctly in the global /api/reports/gallery.

title: show_project_gallery_displays_recent_renders_and_photos
description: Validate that the project gallery endpoint correctly visualizes recently generated renderings and photos related to the project.

title: generate_cad_creates_downloadable_dxf_file
description: Test the CAD generation endpoint to ensure it extracts structural geometry from room images and generates a downloadable DXF file without format errors.

title: role_based_access_enforces_permissions_and_validation
description: Verify that role-based tool access and Pydantic validation correctly reject unauthorized or malformed requests, enforcing security policies across all endpoints.
